Former Sports Editor

May   The Flying WV makes an appearance on the PNC Park scoreboard just before West Virginias game with Penn State

The West Virginia University baseball team will head up to Pittsburgh to play traditional rival Penn State at PNC Park PERIOD

The Mountaineers  cruised to a  win over the Nittany Lions last season at the major league ballpark behind the impressive pitching prowess of Sam Kessler Cody Wood and Braden Zarbnisky PERIOD

The Backyard Brawl meeting at Monongalia County Ballpark was originally scheduled for March  but was postponed due to inclement weather PERIOD WVU beat Pitt  in last seasons home finale behind the bat of Kyle Davis PERIOD

SEASON OVERVIEW

Penn StateThe Nittany Lions hold a  record and have been struggling to find the win column as of late PERIOD After sweeping Elon in the opening weekend of the season PSU has only won four games two of which were against lowly NJIT PERIOD On average Penn State is outscored by about three runs per game PERIOD

PittPitt has been one of the most surprising teams of the ACC holding a  record PERIOD After being swept in their first two conference series against Virginia Tech and North Carolina the Panthers picked up an upset win against thenNo PERIOD  Duke at home and are coming off two consecutive ACC series wins against Virginia and Boston College PERIOD Pitt is  in nonconference play losing only to Saint Louis and Seton Hall both of which are in the RPI top  PERIOD

Starters WVU vs PERIOD PSUPITT

Tuesday Jackson Wolf  . eRA vs PERIOD Eric Mock  . eRA

Wednesday TBD vs PERIOD Dan Hammer  . eRA
